title: FS: T206's All SGC Graded - SOLD
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS: T206's All SGC Graded - SOLD
posts.post_content:
All forms of payment accepted. PM over post. Postage $3 any amount of cards.

A nice group of SGC graded T206's available today:

1. Bill Burns, SC 350 back, SGC 40. SOLD
2. Frank Isbell, Pied. 150 back, SGC 30. SOLD
3. George Davis, Old Mill back, SGC 10. SOLD
4. Frank Smith, White Cap, Chicago, Old Mill back, SGC 40. SOLD
5. Lee Tannehill, L. on bottom, Old Mill back, SGC 40. SOLD

Thanks for looking,
Tony
PM sent on the Smith Old Mill.
I'll take Davis OM. PM coming.
